author: James Joyce
text: All three start in an hour. I send copies of F. and E.T. See that Schmitz sees E.T. notice but keep a copy for me. I managed a first class pass to London being member of Italian press and showed them P.d.S. and E.T. My publishers advanced Â£3 without any difficulty. Get ready for Eva and tell Nora to prepare also for Kettle. Jim
